level.heading: PROHIBITION ON SALE AND DISTRIBUTION OF CERTAIN DISPOSABLE CARRYOUT BAGS (ยง1-1011) Disposable carryout bags made of plastic that is not one hundred percent (100%)ecyclable shall not be sold or distributed, retail or wholesale, in theistrict. The prohibition set forth in this section applies to all disposable carryoutags sold or distributed, retail or wholesale, to or by any establishment in theistrict, whether or not the establishment is a retail establishment. Source: Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 7208, 7214 (August 13, 2010).
